3.subtitle: ABOUT THE NATURE OF THE PRODUCTS OFFERED BY CLICKING ON THE INFO POINTS:

login.title: Welcome
login.subtitle: You're one step away from creating your sovereign account for free!

onboarding_1.title: Set up currency display and notifications
onboarding_1.money_question: Do you want to display amounts in Euros or Dollars?
onboarding_1.money_question_helper: To help you, amounts converted for display (according to the chosen currency) will be preceded by an asterisk (*).
onboarding_1.notifications_question: Do you want to enable notifications?
onboarding_1.notifications_question_helper: Stay ahead and take advantage of the best investment opportunities.
onboarding_1.language_question: In which language would you like to use the app?

onboarding_2.title: Your money works for you.
onboarding_2.subtitle_3: and earn liquid interest from the very first second, unaffected by exchange rates.
onboarding_2.second_subtitle_3: that only you have access to.

onboarding_3.title: Access your account
onboarding_3.subtitle: Open or access an existing account with one click:

onboarding_4.title: Fund your account
onboarding_4.subtitle: Deposit your funds into an interest-bearing account via credit card, Apple Pay, or Google Pay.

transactions.title: Transaction history
transactions.no_transactions_1: You have not yet made any transactions.
transactions.no_transactions_2: Fund your checking account or make an investment to start.
transactions.copied_link: A link to the transaction has been copied to your clipboard

disclaimer: By continuing, you confirm that you have read and accepted

amount_error.title: Incorrect amount
amount_error.message: Please enter an amount between 5 and 100.

disclaimer.description: Amounts are rounded to the hundredth (2 decimal places).

main_account.title: Your checking account
main_account.description_1: Be the true owner of your funds; only you can interact with your sovereign checking account.
main_account.description_2: You can transfer money from it to your interest-bearing accounts.

investment_account.title: Your investments
investment_account.description_1: This investment behaves like a savings account, but better!
investment_account.description_2: Lock in your funds and earn interest from the first minute. Withdraw anytime.
investment_account.disclaimer: Estimated annual yield and not guaranteed.

transaction.title: This action requires your attention
transaction.description: You are about to transfer {{amount}}{{currency}} from your checking account to your interest-bearing account. Are you sure you want to continue?

offramp.title: Withdraw from your account
offramp.subtitle: You can recover funds from your account by withdrawing via credit card, bank transfer, or Google Pay.
